name: Complete Data Extraction - CA Auto GEICO
description: Test case with all fields present - complete data extraction scenario
input: Hi, I'm looking for auto insurance in California. I'm 35 years old, have 2 vehicles, 2 drivers in my household, clean driving record for the past 5 years, and I own my home. My zip code is 90210.

expectedRoute.rationale: GEICO is eligible for auto insurance in California and matches all eligibility criteria.
